name: @honeycombio/opentelemetry-web
description: Honeycomb OpenTelemetry Wrapper for Browser Applications

scripts.start:smoke-test-example: docker build -t smoke-tests . && docker run -dp 127.0.0.1:3000:3000 --name smoke-tests smoke-tests
scripts.test:smoke: npm run start:smoke-test-example && cypress run && npm run clean:smoke-test-example
scripts.clean:smoke-test-example: docker stop smoke-tests && docker rm smoke-tests

author: Honeycomb <support@honeycomb.io> (https://www.honeycomb.io/)
